info.title: Kursplan API
info.description: Creates html and configuration for showing course syllabus information based on course code and semester

get.summary: GET a test endpoint that is protected by api key to validate that consumer has a proper api key

get.description: Gets html and configuration for syllabus pdf

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: Course code that has the requested syllabus

parameters.name: semester
parameters.description: Semester, five digits, with the year and semester number    (Fall: 1, Spring: 2, ex: 20102) for the requested syllabus

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language for the response, 'sv': Swedish, 'en': English, default is 'sv'

get.summary: Create a syllabus PDF for course code and semester in requested language
get.description: Retrieves data from Kopps and creates a syllabus PDF for course code and semester in requested language.

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: Course code that has the requested syllabus

parameters.name: semester
parameters.description: Semester, five digits, with the year and semester number    (Fall: 1, Spring: 2, ex: 20102) for the requested syllabus

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language for the response, 'sv': Swedish, 'en': English, default is 'sv'

parameters.name: documentName
parameters.description: Desired name for PDF document. File suffix pdf will be added.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Should PDF document be downloaded? If download parameter is true, the response will have a 'Content-Disposition' header set to 'attachment', otherwise 'inline'.
